content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, thank you for coming to see my apartment. I suggest we start the negotiation at 2000 Euro per month. Remember, let's only discuss the rental price for now.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for sharing the initial price. However, I don't want to continue the negotiation at this moment because I would like to gather more information about similar apartments in the area before deciding. I'll get back to you after my research.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: That's alright, Mr. Abbasi. I look forward to your response. 'TERMINATE'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
